name: Fight or Die (itch) (Excvazar Games)
description:
The legends of the great treasure of resenkhar were spread throughout the world. Everyone was preparing to get the treasure before anyone else. The great battle awaits those who enter the temple of resenkhar, and the treasure awaits the winner.

Fight or Die is a 2-player fighter game, where you can choose different characters.  Use your abilities to destroy your opponent, and perform outstanding combos. 

Controls: XBOX

Attack Up: Y

Attack Middle: X

Attack Lower: A

Fireball: B

Sheild: LB

Movement:

DPAD - Left, Up, Right
